column4: hello, I've just upgraded from 6.06 to 6.10 on my laptop and now I have a serious problem.  every few mins  my mouse pointer will stick in one place for about three seconds, then move for a few sec and then stick again!  this did't happen in 6.06
Where is a good place to get help with my laptop problem?
There have been many problems upgarding to edgy from dapper
